resources.string: The purpose of this research project is to assess to what extent can mobile applications promote and motivate continued fitness and wellbeing amongst 18-25 year olds in the UK. This is a research project being conducted by Matthew West at Coventry University. You are invited to participate in this research project because you are a student at Coventry University and fall within the target age group. Your participation in this research study is voluntary. You may choose not to participate. If you decide to participate in this research survey, you may withdraw at any time. If you decide not to participate in this study or if you withdraw from participating at any time, you will not be penalized. The procedure involves filling in a survey that will take approximately 2 minutes. Your responses will be confidential and we do not collect identifying information such as your name or email address. The survey questions will be about your current lifestyle and fitness regime and will be used solely to further this study. Your information will remain confidential. All data is stored in a password protected electronic format for the online surveys and the paper surveys will remain in a secure location. To help protect your confidentiality, the surveys will not contain information that will personally identify you. The results of this study will be used for scholarly purposes only. Survey data will be destroyed 6 months after the publication of results.
